import { Box, Button, Grid, TextField, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Add = () => { const sendRequest = async () => { const res = await axios .post("http://localhost:5000/api/blog/add", { title: inputs.title, description: inputs.description, image: inputs.imageURL, user: localStorage.getItem("userId"), }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); const data = await res.data; return data; }; return (
Add A New Product
); }; export default Add;
